#id=1
#text=I wanted to make my girlfriend her favorite roasted chicken dinner a few days ago .
#id=2
#text=I realized that I did n't have everything I needed and had to go the grocery store for it .
#id=3
#text=I drove to the store and got out and walked inside .
#id=4
#text=After making a short list in my head , I wandered the aisles and grabbed the chicken , fresh vegetables and all of the necessary ingredients for the meal , as it has a lot of them .
#id=5
#text=After grabbing everything I needed I then walked to the checkout counter .
#id=6
#text=It was a very long line and I had to wait for a long time to purchase my items .
#id=7
#text=The cashier apologized over and over and thanked me for being so patient .
#id=8
#text=I then paid for my items and walked out to my car .
#id=9
#text=I placed the goods into it and made sure to put my shopping cart back into the area with the rest of them .
#text=It was a bit of a stressful visit to the grocery store , but in the end , I made a successful dinner .
